name: Agony Haunt
description:
London, 1858.

You are a spiritualist familiar with the occult and the divine, a master of divination. You can see the future, but do your customers always want to hear the truth?

Sometimes they may come with a specific outcome in mind and may be unwilling to accept any other outcome. It's important to remember that the gift of divination is not always about predicting the future but providing a deeper understanding of the present situation and potential outcomes.

There is a knock on the door, your future awaits…

Credits
Development Team: Callum Deery, Sahar Mirhadi, Florence Smith Nicholls, Amy Smith, Sunny Thaicharoen.
Music By Erin Robinson.
Assets created using Midjourney, PixaMotion and ChatGPT.
Made as part of the 2023 IGGI Game Jam.
